email_chain.subject: Freight Inquiry for Crude Oil Shipment
email_chain.body: Hi John, I hope this email finds you well. We have a vessel available for a crude oil shipment from Houston to Rotterdam. The vessel is the MV Oceanic Star, 150,000 DWT, 280m LOA. The laycan is 15-20 October. Starting freight quote is in the low 50s, $50.75 per metric ton. Let me know if this works for you or if you need further details. Best regards, Sarah

email_chain.subject: Re: Freight Inquiry for Crude Oil Shipment
email_chain.body: Hi Sarah, thanks for the details. The laycan works for us, but the freight rate is a bit high. Can you come down to $49.50 per metric ton? Also, can you confirm the demurrage rate? Looking forward to your reply. Best, John

email_chain.subject: Re: Freight Inquiry for Crude Oil Shipment
email_chain.body: Hi John, thanks for your response. I can offer $50.00 per metric ton, which is a competitive rate given the current market. The demurrage rate is $25,000 per day, pro rata. Let me know if this is acceptable. Best, Sarah

email_chain.subject: Re: Freight Inquiry for Crude Oil Shipment
email_chain.body: Hi Sarah, $50.00 per metric ton is acceptable. However, can we agree on a demurrage rate of $22,000 per day? Also, please confirm the laytime details. Best, John

email_chain.subject: Re: Freight Inquiry for Crude Oil Shipment
email_chain.body: Hi John, we can agree on a demurrage rate of $22,000 per day. The laytime is 72 hours total, with 24 hours notice time. Please confirm if we can proceed with these terms. Best, Sarah

email_chain.subject: Re: Freight Inquiry for Crude Oil Shipment
email_chain.body: Hi Sarah, the terms are acceptable. Let’s proceed with the MV Oceanic Star for the crude oil shipment from Houston to Rotterdam. Please send over the charter party for review. Best, John

email_chain.subject: Re: Freight Inquiry for Crude Oil Shipment
email_chain.body: Hi John, great to hear. I’ll have the charter party drafted and sent over by end of day. Thanks for the smooth negotiation. Best, Sarah
